title: Did the Director of Tramp ask the Supreme Court to legalize the expulsion of LGBT workers?
subtitle: News sites were posted on a couple of cases of potential interest on the Tribunal ' s list in autumn 2019.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: The Trump Department of Justice requested the United States Supreme Court to rule, in two consolidated cases, in such a way as to establish the legitimacy of workers who expel employers on the basis of their sexual orientation.
